rows.label: tev900293_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, there you are!
Got a minute?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0020
rows.name:
You know Director General Chausson,
right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0030
rows.name:
So, he's asked me to share my
knowledge of cosmoarchaeology
with the people of Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0040
rows.name:
Well, we decided to hold a lecture,
and it sounds like we have a lot more
interested individuals than I expected...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0050
rows.name:
I've never done any public speaking
in front of alien races... Uhm—I don't
suppose you have any advice...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_JNK0060
rows.name: Play it Safe

rows.label: tev900293_SEL0070
rows.name: Tell her to just be herself.

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0080
rows.name: Really? I mean, I can do that, but—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0090
rows.name:
I'm afraid my natural tone might come
across as a bit...overly familiar? Cheeky?
I won't be breaking any taboos, will I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0100
rows.name:
...You don't think so? Erm...
Well, okay then, if you say so.
I'll trust your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_JNK0110
rows.name: Throw a Curveball

rows.label: tev900293_SEL0120
rows.name:
Say she could have Celica
join her on stage.

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0130
rows.name: Oh! That's a great idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0140
rows.name:
Celica's sweetness is something that
unites all peoples, human and xeno alike!
I'm not even exaggerating![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0150
rows.name:
Her presence will guarantee the whole
thing will go as smoothly as her skin.
I'll go talk to her later![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_JNK0160
rows.name: Advise Properly

rows.label: tev900293_SEL0170
rows.name:
Recommend she lead with
an opening act.

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0180
rows.name: An...opening act?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0190
rows.name:
Oh, I see! A strategy to put the room
more at ease, isn't it...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0200
rows.name:
How about I recite some of the poems
I wrote on my journey, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0210
rows.name:
According to data from the Lifehold, Earth
is no stranger to poetry either. It would be
a perfect point of common reference![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0220
rows.name:
All right! I'm starting to feel good about it.
...I'm actually looking forward to this now!
And my shoulders have relaxed! Score![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0230
rows.name:
All that's left is to pin down the exact
topic. Cosmoarchaeology is a broad
subject... Any suggestions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_JNK0240
rows.name: Suggest Anthropology

rows.label: tev900293_SEL0250
rows.name: Suggest she talk about Qlu culture.

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0260
rows.name:
Yeahhh, I think it'll have to be something
along those lines. If I find Earth culture so
fascinating, it surely goes both ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0270
rows.name:
All right! Then I'll do my darndest to
accurately and fully convey all the charms
of the Qlu, leaving nothing on the table![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0280
rows.name:
All in the hopes that one day, it will be
more than just Celica and me who get
to meet the people of Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_JNK0290
rows.name: Suggest Trivia

rows.label: tev900293_SEL0300
rows.name: Suggest she talk about her life.

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0310
rows.name:
My life? Hmm... I don't know if it's all
that interesting, really. I've barely done
anything with it so far...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0320
rows.name:
Oh, but I remember going to dinner
with Elma the other day. I had a blast,
actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0330
rows.name:
We seemed to get along so well—before
we knew it we'd been talking until the
morning light. Hah... Largely about you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0340
rows.name:
She did not agree to relieve you of your
duties so you could be my assistant, FYI.
Well... That's my loss, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0350
rows.name:
Hmm... I suppose that's that, then?
I think I've got a rough idea in my mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900293_MSG0360
rows.name:
Thanks for helping me hash it out.
And I hope you'll come to the lecture too![ST:wait ]
